sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SYNDIC, in government and commerce, an officer, in divers countries, intruſted with the affairs of a city or other community, who calls meetings, makes repreſentations and ſolicitations to the miniſtry, magiſtracy, &c. according to the exigency of the caſe.
